segment.source: Reference about the command-line options for the IExpress Wizard.
segment.target: Reference about the command-line options for the IExpress Wizard.

segment.source: IExpress Wizard command-line options (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: IExpress Wizard command-line options (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 with SP1
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 with SP1

segment.source: IExpress Wizard command-line options
segment.target: IExpress Wizard command-line options

segment.source: Use command-line options with the IExpress Wizard (IExpress.exe) to control your Internet Explorer custom browser package extraction process.
segment.target: Use command-line options with the IExpress Wizard (IExpress.exe) to control your Internet Explorer custom browser package extraction process.

segment.source: These command-line options work with IExpress:
segment.target: These command-line options work with IExpress:

segment.source: Parameter
segment.target: Parameter

segment.source: Action
segment.target: Action

segment.source: Specifies quiet mode, hiding all of the prompts, while files are being extracted.
segment.target: Specifies quiet mode, hiding all of the prompts, while files are being extracted.

segment.source: This option won’t suppress prompts during Setup.
segment.target: This option won’t suppress prompts during Setup.

segment.source: Specifies user-quiet mode, letting some of the progress and error messages appear to the employee.
segment.target: Specifies user-quiet mode, letting some of the progress and error messages appear to the employee.

segment.source: Specifies administrator-quiet mode, hiding all of the progress and error messages from the employee.
segment.target: Specifies administrator-quiet mode, hiding all of the progress and error messages from the employee.

segment.source: Specifies where to store your extracted files.
segment.target: Specifies where to store your extracted files.

segment.source: Extracts all of the files without installing them.
segment.target: Extracts all of the files without installing them.

segment.source: If isn’t used, you’ll be prompted for a storage folder.
segment.target: If isn’t used, you’ll be prompted for a storage folder.

segment.source: Specifies the UNC path and name of the Setup .inf or .exe file.
segment.target: Specifies the UNC path and name of the Setup .inf or .exe file.

segment.source: Never restarts the computer after installation.
segment.target: Never restarts the computer after installation.

segment.source: Always restarts the computer after installation.
segment.target: Always restarts the computer after installation.

segment.source: Restarts the computer after installation without prompting the employee.
segment.target: Restarts the computer after installation without prompting the employee.

segment.source: For more information, see Command-line switches for IExpress software update packages.
segment.target: For more information, see Command-line switches for IExpress software update packages.

segment.target: Related topics
